A framework for analysis and visualization of high content screening





Correlation

Use easy to use correlation pipelines to conveniently correlate cellular features.




Clustering

Use a variety of clustering algorithms to explore your dataset.





Dimensionality Reduction

Use Principal Component Analysis (PCA), TSNEs and UMAPS to visualize your dataset.



Statistical Testing

Perform and visualize results of common statistical tests.



Cellular Migration

Integrate x- and y-coordinates to visualize cellular migration behaviour under different conditions.
